Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: SpaceWarp, Micro Engineer | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: i7-13700k | GPU: 4070ti 12GB | RAM: 32GB DDR5

 

Unable to record video or take screenshots with GeForce Experience overlay.

 

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12
Works for me. You sure it's problem with the game, not the Nvidia software? It doesn't show the record popup but definitely saves videos here.

Under Privacy did you click on Allow Desktop Capture? They don't say so, but it's needed.

I had same problem.

(Apologies if you knew that already, trying to help)

16 hours ago, Filed.Teeth said:

Under Privacy did you click on Allow Desktop Capture? They don't say so, but it's needed.

That's a good point because for unknown reason, all the recordings from KSP2 save in "Desktop" folder.
Thank you, all, that does work swell. Enabling desktop capture works and saves to the Desktop folder. I guess I would still call it a (very small) bug, perhaps one for NVIDIA. Happy Hotfix Summer!
